location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Major General William Grant Keir, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Grant Keir writes to inform Bruce that Captain Collier has diverted the Honourable Company's cruizer Teignmouthto Bushire, to enable Bruce to re-join the expedition on the Persian coast. Grant Keir also requests that Bruce look at the accompanying dispatch from Major Willock (not included in the file).
